channel.title: Buying all glowstone
channel.description:
I need around 30-40, but I'll buy any amount from 1-64. Does anyone have any they're willing to sell?
edit, oops wrong section. Can someone move it here pls? http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/board,178.0.html
k agl sold it, offer closed :)
